vulnerable_road_users.description: A motorcyclist on the right side of the ego car, riding in the same direction as the ego car.
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: The motorcyclist is relatively near to the ego car and shares the lane, which requires careful monitoring to prevent any potential collision especially if the motorcyclist makes sudden maneuvers.

general_perception.description and explanation: In the traffic scene observed, there is a motorcyclist located on the right side of the ego car, both traveling in the same direction. The proximity of the motorcyclist to the ego car, along with the fact that they're sharing the same lane, necessitates vigilant observation and caution from the ego car. This attention is crucial to avert any possible collisions, particularly if the motorcyclist performs any unexpected maneuvers. There are no other vehicles, traffic signs, traffic lights, traffic cones, barriers, or other objects reported in the scene.

1.description and explanation: This object is a tricycle, determined by its three wheels and small frame. It is being used for transportation on the road. The presence of the tricycle in the driving scene suggests that the ego car should ensure it is maintaining a safe following distance and potentially prepare to overtake with caution, observing all safety protocols and speed limits. It is important for the safety of both the tricycle rider and the vehicle occupants that the ego car follows these precautions.

driving_suggestion: The ego car should maintain a safe following distance from the motorcyclist, being prepared for any potential sudden changes in the motorcyclist's direction or speed. It is also advisable to reduce speed due to the rough road conditions to ensure safe handling and braking in case of unexpected obstacles or changes in road texture.
